definitions.title: n.pr.loc. 1.
definitions.body: ´[[ו]]: in land of Hamath 2Ki 23:33, 2Ki 25:21 = Je 52:27, Je 39:6; c. [[ה]] loc., [[רִבְ֫לָתָךְ]] 2Ki 25:6, 2Ki 25:20 = Je 52:26, also (‘in land of Hamath’) Je 39:5, Je 52:9; [[בְּרִבְלָָתָה]] v:Je 39:10; read [[רִבְ֫לָתָה]] also Ez Eze 6:14 (for MT ´[[דִּב]]:, v. [[[דִּבְלָה]]]); LXX usu. Deblaqa (also Ez Eze 6:14); mod. Ribla on Orontes, Rob:BR ii. 507; iii. 543 ff. Bd:Pal 3. 405.
[[הָרִבְלָה]] ([[מִשְּׁפָס]]) Nu 34:11, on NE. border of land of Isr., certainly not so far
but site unknown; LXX a)po) sepfamar Bhla, whence Di al. conj. [[הַרְבֵּ֫לָךְ]], but not Harmel, 8 m. SW. from ´[[ו]]:
